verses.verse: The sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> [were] Gershon, <WH1648> Kohath <WH6955> and Merari. <WH4847>
And the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> [were] Amram, <WH6019> Izhar, <WH3324> Hebron, <WH9116> and Uzziel. <WH5816>

And the children <WH1121> of Amram <WH6019> [were] Aaron, <WH175> Moses, <WH4872> and Miriam. <WH4813> And the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> [were] Nadab, <WH5070> Abihu, <WH30> Eleazar, <WH499> and Ithamar. <WH385>
Eleazar <WH499> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Phinehas, <WH6372> [and] Phinehas <WH6372> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Abishua, <WH50>
and Abishua <WH50> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Bukki, <WH1231> and Bukki <WH1231> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Uzzi, <WH5813>
and Uzzi <WH5813> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Zerahiah, <WH2228> and Zerahiah <WH2228> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Meraioth, <WH4812>
Meraioth <WH4812> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Amariah, <WH568> and Amariah <WH568> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Ahitub, <WH285>
and Ahitub <WH285> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Zadok, <WH6659> and Zadok <WH6659> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Ahimaaz, <WH290>
and Ahimaaz <WH290> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Azariah, <WH5838> and Azariah <WH5838> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Johanan, <WH3076>

and Johanan <WH3076> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Azariah <WH5838> (it was he who <WH834> served <WH3547> as the priest <WH3547> in the house <WH1004> which <WH834> Solomon <WH8010> built <WH1129> in Jerusalem <WH3389>),
and Azariah <WH5838> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Amariah, <WH568> and Amariah <WH568> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Ahitub, <WH285>
and Ahitub <WH285> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Zadok, <WH6659> and Zadok <WH6659> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Shallum, <WH7967>
and Shallum <WH7967> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Hilkiah, <WH2518> and Hilkiah <WH2518> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Azariah, <WH5838>
and Azariah <WH5838> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Seraiah, <WH8304> and Seraiah <WH8304> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Jehozadak; <WH3087>
and Jehozadak <WH3087> went <WH1980> [along] when the Lord <WH3068> carried <WH1540> Judah <WH3063> and Jerusalem <WH3389> away <WH1540> into exile <WH1540> by Nebuchadnezzar. <WH5019>
The sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> [were] Gershom, <WH1647> Kohath, <WH6955> and Merari. <WH4847>
And these <WH428> are the names <WH8034> of the sons <WH1121> of Gershom: <WH1647> Libni <WH3845> and Shimei. <WH8096>
And the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> [were] Amram, <WH6019> Izhar, <WH3324> Hebron, <WH9116> and Uzziel. <WH5816>
The sons <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847> [were] Mahli <WH4249> and Mushi. <WH4187> And these <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of the Levites <WH3881> according to their fathers' [households.]
Of Gershom: <WH1647> Libni <WH3845> his son, <WH1121> Jahath <WH3189> his son, <WH1121> Zimmah <WH2155> his son, <WH1121>
Joah <WH3098> his son, <WH1121> Iddo <WH5714> his son, <WH1121> Zerah <WH2226> his son, <WH1121> Jeatherai <WH2979> his son. <WH1121>
The sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> [were] Amminadab <WH5992> his son, <WH1121> Korah <WH7141> his son, <WH1121> Assir <WH617> his son, <WH1121>
Elkanah <WH511> his son, <WH1121> Ebiasaph <WH43> his son, <WH1121> and Assir <WH617> his son, <WH1121>
Tahath <WH8480> his son, <WH1121> Uriel <WH222> his son, <WH1121> Uzziah <WH5818> his son, <WH1121> and Shaul <WH7586> his son. <WH1121>
And the sons <WH1121> of Elkanah <WH511> [were] Amasai <WH6022> and Ahimoth. <WH287>
[As for] Elkanah, <WH511> the sons <WH1121> of Elkanah <WH511> [were] Zophai <WH6689> his son <WH1121> and Nahath <WH5184> his son, <WH1121>
Eliab <WH446> his son, <WH1121> Jeroham <WH3395> his son, <WH1121> Elkanah <WH511> his son. <WH1121>
And the sons <WH1121> of Samuel <WH8050> [were] Joel, <WH3100> the first-born and Abijah, <WH29> the second. <WH8145>
The sons <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847> [were] Mahli, <WH4249> Libni <WH3845> his son, <WH1121> Shimei <WH8096> his son, <WH1121> Uzzah <WH9396> his son, <WH1121>
Shimea <WH8092> his son, <WH1121> Haggiah <WH2293> his son, <WH1121> Asaiah <WH6222> his son. <WH1121>

Now these <WH428> are those whom <WH834> David <WH1732> appointed <WH5975> over <WH5921> the service <WH3027> of song <WH7892> in the house <WH1004> of the Lord, <WH3068> after <WH4480> the ark <WH727> rested <WH4494> [there.]

And they ministered <WH8334> with song <WH7892> before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH4908> of the tent <WH168> of meeting, <WH4150> until <WH5704> Solomon <WH8010> had built <WH1129> the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068> in Jerusalem; <WH3389> and they served <WH5975> in their office <WH5656> according <WH5921> to their order. <WH4941>

And these <WH428> are those who served <WH5975> with their sons. <WH1121> From the sons <WH1121> of the Kohathites <WH6956> [were] Heman <WH1968> the singer, <WH7891> the son <WH1121> of Joel, <WH3100> the son <WH1121> of Samuel, <WH8050>
the son <WH1121> of Elkanah, <WH511> the son <WH1121> of Jeroham, <WH3395> the son <WH1121> of Eliel, <WH447> the son <WH1121> of Toah, <WH8430>
the son <WH1121> of Zuph, <WH6689> the son <WH1121> of Elkanah, <WH511> the son <WH1121> of Mahath, <WH4287> the son <WH1121> of Amasai, <WH6022>
the son <WH1121> of Elkanah, <WH511> the son <WH1121> of Joel, <WH3100> the son <WH1121> of Azariah, <WH5838> the son <WH1121> of Zephaniah, <WH6846>
the son <WH1121> of Tahath, <WH8480> the son <WH1121> of Assir, <WH617> the son <WH1121> of Ebiasaph, <WH43> the son <WH1121> of Korah, <WH7141>
the son <WH1121> of Izhar, <WH3324> the son <WH1121> of Kohath, <WH6955> the son <WH1121> of Levi, <WH3878> the son <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
And [Heman's] brother <WH251> Asaph <WH623> stood <WH5975> at his right <WH3225> hand, <WH3225> even Asaph <WH623> the son <WH1121> of Berechiah, <WH1296> the son <WH1121> of Shimea, <WH8092>
the son <WH1121> of Michael, <WH4317> the son <WH1121> of Baaseiah, <WH1202> the son <WH1121> of Malchijah, <WH4441>
the son <WH1121> of Ethni, <WH867> the son <WH1121> of Zerah, <WH2226> the son <WH1121> of Adaiah, <WH5718>
the son <WH1121> of Ethan, <WH387> the son <WH1121> of Zimmah, <WH2155> the son <WH1121> of Shimei, <WH8096>
the son <WH1121> of Jahath, <WH3189> the son <WH1121> of Gershom, <WH1647> the son <WH1121> of Levi. <WH3878>

And on the left <WH8040> hand <WH8040> [were] their kinsmen <WH251> the sons <WH1121> of Merari: <WH4847> Ethan <WH387> the son <WH1121> of Kishi, <WH7029> the son <WH1121> of Abdi, <WH5660> the son <WH1121> of Malluch, <WH4409>
the son <WH1121> of Hashabiah, <WH2811> the son <WH1121> of Amaziah, <WH558> the son <WH1121> of Hilkiah, <WH2518>
the son <WH1121> of Amzi, <WH557> the son <WH1121> of Bani, <WH1137> the son <WH1121> of Shemer, <WH8106>
the son <WH1121> of Mahli, <WH4249> the son <WH1121> of Mushi, <WH4187> the son <WH1121> of Merari, <WH4847> the son <WH1121> of Levi. <WH3878>
And their kinsmen <WH251> the Levites <WH3881> were appointed <WH5414> for all <WH3605> the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH4908> of the house <WH1004> of God. <WH430>

But Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> offered <WH6999> on the altar <WH4196> of burnt <WH5930> offering <WH5930> and on the altar <WH4196> of incense, <WH7004> for all <WH3605> the work <WH4399> of the most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> place, <WH6944> and to make <WH3722> atonement <WH3722> for Israel, <WH3478> according to all <WH3605> that Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of God <WH430> had commanded. <WH6680>
And these <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Aaron: <WH175> Eleazar <WH499> his son, <WH1121> Phinehas <WH6372> his son, <WH1121> Abishua <WH50> his son, <WH1121>
Bukki <WH1231> his son, <WH1121> Uzzi <WH5813> his son, <WH1121> Zerahiah <WH2228> his son, <WH1121>
Meraioth <WH4812> his son, <WH1121> Amariah <WH568> his son, <WH1121> Ahitub <WH285> his son, <WH1121>
Zadok <WH6659> his son, <WH1121> Ahimaaz <WH290> his son. <WH1121>

Now these <WH428> are their settlements <WH4186> according to their camps <WH2918> within their borders. <WH1366> To the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> of the families <WH4940> of the Kohathites <WH6956> (for theirs <WH1992> was the [first] lot <WH1486>),
to them they gave <WH5414> Hebron <WH2275> in the land <WH776> of Judah, <WH3063> and its pasture <WH4054> lands <WH4054> around <WH5439> it;
but the fields <WH7704> of the city <WH5892> and its villages, <WH9161> they gave <WH5414> to Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh. <WH3312>

And to the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> they gave <WH5414> the [following] cities <WH5892> of refuge: <WH4733> Hebron, <WH2275> Libnah <WH3841> also with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> Jattir, <WH3492> Eshtemoa <WH851> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054>
Hilen <WH2432> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> Debir <WH1688> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054>
Ashan <WH6228> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> and Beth-shemesh with its pasture <WH4054> lands; <WH4054>

and from the tribe <WH4294> of Benjamin: <WH1144> Geba <WH1387> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> Allemeth <WH5964> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> and Anathoth <WH6068> with its pasture <WH4054> lands. <WH4054> All <WH3605> their cities <WH5892> throughout their families <WH4940> were thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> cities. <WH5892>

Then to the rest <WH3498> of the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> [were given] by lot, <WH1486> from the family <WH4940> of the tribe, <WH4294> from the half-tribe <WH2677>, the half of Manasseh, <WH4519> ten <WH6235> cities. <WH5892>

And to the sons <WH1121> of Gershom, <WH1647> according to their families, <WH4940> [were given] from the tribe <WH4294> of Issachar <WH3485> and from the tribe <WH4294> of Asher, <WH836> the tribe <WH4294> of Naphtali, <WH5321> and the tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh, <WH4519> thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> in Bashan. <WH1316>

To the sons <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847> [were given] by lot, <WH1486> according to their families, <WH4940> from the tribe <WH4294> of Reuben, <WH7205> the tribe <WH4294> of Gad, <WH1410> and the tribe <WH4294> of Zebulun, <WH2074> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> cities. <WH5892>
So the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> gave <WH5414> to the Levites <WH3881> the cities <WH5892> with their pasture <WH4054> lands. <WH4054>

And they gave <WH5414> by lot <WH1486> from the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Judah, <WH3063> the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Simeon, <WH8095> and the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin, <WH1144> these <WH428> cities <WH5892> which <WH834> are mentioned <WH7121> by name. <WH8034>
Now some <WH4480> of the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> had <WH1961> cities <WH5892> of their territory <WH1366> from the tribe <WH4294> of Ephraim. <WH669>

And they gave <WH5414> to them the [following] cities <WH5892> of refuge: <WH4733> Shechem <WH7927> in the hill <WH2022> country <WH2022> of Ephraim <WH669> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> Gezer <WH1507> also with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054>
Jokmeam <WH3361> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> Beth-horon with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054>
Aijalon <WH357> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> and Gath-rimmon with its pasture <WH4054> lands; <WH4054>

and from the half-tribe of Manasseh: <WH4519> Aner <WH6063> with its pasture <WH4054> lands <WH4054> and Bileam <WH9056> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> for the rest <WH3498> of the family <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Kohath. <WH6955>

To the sons <WH1121> of Gershom <WH1647> [were given,] from the family <WH4940> of the half-tribe of Manasseh: <WH4519> Golan <WH1474> in Bashan <WH1316> with its pasture <WH4054> lands <WH4054> and Ashtaroth <WH6252> with its pasture <WH4054> lands; <WH4054>
and from the tribe <WH4294> of Issachar: <WH3485> Kedesh <WH6943> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> Daberath <WH1705> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054>
and Ramoth <WH7216> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> Anem <WH6046> with its pasture <WH4054> lands; <WH4054>
and from the tribe <WH4294> of Asher: <WH836> Mashal <WH4913> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> Abdon <WH5658> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054>
Hukok <WH9124> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> and Rehob <WH7340> with its pasture <WH4054> lands; <WH4054>

and from the tribe <WH4294> of Naphtali: <WH5321> Kedesh <WH6943> in Galilee <WH1551> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> Hammon <WH2540> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> and Kiriathaim <WH7156> with its pasture <WH4054> lands. <WH4054>

To the rest <WH3498> of [the Levites,] the sons <WH1121> of Merari, <WH4847> [were given,] from the tribe <WH4294> of Zebulun: <WH2074> Rimmono <WH9558> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> Tabor <WH8396> with its pasture <WH4054> lands; <WH4054>

and beyond <WH4480> <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383> at Jericho, <WH3405> on the east <WH4217> side <WH4217> of the Jordan, <WH3383> [were given them,] from the tribe <WH4294> of Reuben: <WH7205> Bezer <WH1221> in the wilderness <WH4057> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> Jahzah <WH3096> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054>
Kedemoth <WH6932> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> and Mephaath <WH4158> with its pasture <WH4054> lands; <WH4054>
and from the tribe <WH4294> of Gad: <WH1410> Ramoth <WH7216> in Gilead <WH1568> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> Mahanaim <WH4266> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054>
Heshbon <WH2809> with its pasture <WH4054> lands, <WH4054> and Jazer <WH3270> with its pasture <WH4054> lands. <WH4054>
